testdatapublishing

The goal of testdatapublishing is to …

Installation

You can install the development version of testdatapublishing from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("emmanuellmhango/testdatapublishing")
## Run the following code in console if you don't have the packages
## install.packages(c("dplyr", "knitr", "readr", "stringr", "gt", "kableExtra"))
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(gt)
library(kableExtra)

Alternatively, you can download the individual datasets as a CSV or XLSX file from the table below.

  1. Click Download CSV. A window opens that displays the CSV in your browser.
  2. Right-click anywhere inside the window and select “Save Page As…”.
  3. Save the file in a folder of your choice.
dataset CSV XLSX
testdatapublishing Download CSV Download XLSX

Data

The package provides access to …

library(testdatapublishing)

testdatapublishing

The dataset testdatapublishing contains data about … It has 11640 observations and 9 variables

library(testdatapublishing)  # Ensure the package is loaded

# Load dataset explicitly if needed
data("testdatapublishing", package = "testdatapublishing")

testdatapublishing |> 
  head(3) |> 
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::as_raw_html()
country date_submitted photo_of_the_water_point latitude longtude altitude functional_status current_problem other_current_problems water_quality_issues_with_this_water_point water_quality_issues_on_the_water_point other_water_quality_issues_on_the_water_point households_who_use_this_water_point are_there_times_of_the_year_when_water_is_not_available_from_this_source_due_to_seasonal_variation when_is_water_not_available_from_this_source is_there_a_service_provider_or_someone_responsible_for_operating_and/or_maintaining_this_water_point_or_water_system type_of_service_provider water_point_have_active_water_point_committee

For an overview of the variable names, see the following table.

variable_name variable_type description
country character NA
date_submitted character NA
photo_of_the_water_point character NA
latitude numeric NA
longtude numeric NA
altitude numeric NA
functional_status character NA
current_problem character NA
other_current_problems character NA
water_quality_issues_with_this_water_point character NA
water_quality_issues_on_the_water_point character NA
other_water_quality_issues_on_the_water_point character NA
households_who_use_this_water_point numeric NA
are_there_times_of_the_year_when_water_is_not_available_from_this_source_due_to_seasonal_variation character NA
when_is_water_not_available_from_this_source character NA
is_there_a_service_provider_or_someone_responsible_for_operating_and/or_maintaining_this_water_point_or_water_system character NA
type_of_service_provider character NA
water_point_have_active_water_point_committee character NA
